Director: Joel Coen, Ethan Coen

Cast: Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, Josh Brolin, Barry Pepper, Hailee Steinfeld 
Rating: Not recommended for children under 7 years 


Synopsis: 
The father of the girl of fourteen Mattie Ross (Hailee Steinfeld) is shot dead in cold blood by the Coward Tom Chaney (Josh Brolin), and now she is ready to do justice. 

Seeking help from the police chief Rooster Cogburn (Jeff Bridges), a trigger-happy drunk, goes off with him despite his opposition to catch Chaney. Blood poured from his father to pursue the criminal makes it to the Indian Territory and find him before the Texas Ranger named LaBeouf catch him and take him back to Texas for killing another man. 

Production notes: 
Remake of the 1969 film of the same name starring John Wayne, itself based on the novel by Charles Portis.
